/opt/rocm/bin/amdclang++ -fPIC -O2 -DNDEBUG -msse2 -DLEPTON_USE_JIT -Wl,--no-as-needed -lrt -shared -Wl,-soname,libOpenMMRPMD.so -o ../../libOpenMMRPMD.so CMakeFiles/OpenMMRPMD.dir/openmmapi/src/RPMDIntegrator.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenMMRPMD.dir/openmmapi/src/RPMDMonteCarloBarostat.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenMMRPMD.dir/openmmapi/src/RPMDMonteCarloBarostatImpl.cpp.o -Wl,-rpath,/tmp/openmm/build -ldl ../../libOpenMM.so.7.5 -ldl -lpthread
